skillTree.localised_description: The Faris Jur prefer the fast and lighter steeds of their homeland to the bulkier and strudy warhorse of their knightly cousins in the west.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Captured centuries ago from an arrognat tomb king, Kahled rides atop this great construct with pride.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: As slippery as they come, many have dared to overestimate this crafty knight of the desert.

effects.description:
Attribute: "Snipe" For All Faris Jur Units 
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.

effects.description:
Attribute: "Vanguard Deploy" For All Faris Jur Units 
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Such an ancient realm is no stranger to a few curses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
Dodge, Duck, Dip, Dive, and... Dodge!

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_name: Follower Of The First Blood Dragon
skillTree.localised_description: A pragmatist at heart, Khaled follows whom he must to get what he must. This is no different. Why should his tools change?

effects.description: "Heavy Arrow" ammunition (bonus vs large and AP damage)

skillTree.localised_description: The blood of the first vampire runs thick..

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: -50%
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from Chaos attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Tought by Abhorash himself, the harshest and best lesson learned was "Dodge!"
Born in a land that scorchs all it touches, Khaled and his Faris Jur are no strangers to the ways of survival

effects.description:
Immune to Barren Wasteland attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Though shunned by many a blood knight, the effectivness in such tools during ambush cannot be understated

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -6
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.
Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocated Oath"

ui_effects.localised_text: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

skillTree.localised_description: By which the dead don't stay that way for long, springing back into jerking, clanking Unlife.

ui_effects.localised_text: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

skillTree.localised_description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
